pre_caption: The video opens with a medium shot, where a miniature McDonald's restaurant model is positioned in the center middle ground. To its left in the middle ground stands a tall McDonald's "M" signpost. Oversized replicas of french fries and a drink cup are located slightly behind the restaurant, in the center-right and center-left middle ground, respectively. A "50 MILLION PRIZES" sign is visible to the right in the middle ground. The board game surface itself occupies the foreground and middle ground, with small figurines scattered across it. Green hills form the background at the top of the frame. As the camera pulls back and rises, the scene transitions to a full shot. In this wider view, the entire board-game-like town becomes the central focal point, now more distinctly in the middle ground, surrounded by the expansive green hills and a pale, purplish sky in the background. A white picket fence appears in the far-right background. The camera remains positioned above the subject throughout this transition.

A white picket fence is visible in the distance along the edge of the green hills.**
